bibdata.title: AIEE Switchgear Assemblies
AIEE Switchgear Assemblies
bibdata.docidentifier: AIEE No 27A-1941 (Proposed Revision of AIEE No-27)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: These standards cover assemblies of switchgear devices such as switches, interrupting devices, control, metering, protective and regulating equipment with associated interconnections and supporting structures. These standards do not apply to industrial control equipment, communication switchboards and switching equipment, or switchboards for shipboard.
